alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Crawford; Hancock; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baldwin, Wilkinson, Bibb, northern Twiggs, southwestern Hancock, southern Monroe, southwestern Washington, northeastern Crawford and southern Jones Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Beulah to near James to near Russellville, and moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Macon, Milledgeville, Gray, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Oconee, Payne, Deepstep, Payne City, Midway-Hardwick, Postell, Beulah, Allenwood, Griswoldville, Wesleyan and Skipperton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central, west central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Crawford; Hancock; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
